hero.sub_heading_bold: CloudBootCamp.AI was born from a simple truth :
hero.sub_heading: certifications alone don’t get you hired. Our founder lived it, starting in a $35K IT Technician role and rising to earn $489K as a Senior AWS Cloud Engineer Consultant
hero.sub_title: Founded in 2022, we built what we wished existed: a practical, mentorship-driven program focused on real skills and real results. No theory-only learning. No endless certification chase. Just the hands-on experience, career support, and industry guidance you need to break into cloud engineering.

second_hero.heading: Our vision is to build a world where anyone can break into tech, build generational wealth, and live life on their terms, without needing a degree or certifications.
second_hero.heading_2: Our vision is To build a world where anyone can break into tech, build generational wealth, and live life on their terms, without needing a degree or years of experience.
second_hero.sub_heading: Everything you need to break into tech under one roof.

journey.title: The Frustration Begins
journey.subtitle: I was stuck in a low-paying $35K IT tech job. Overworked. Underpaid. No clear path forward.

journey.title: Trying to Find a Way Out
journey.subtitle: I bounced between certifications and online courses, but none of them got me interviews. I started questioning if tech was even worth it.

journey.title: The Turning Point
journey.subtitle: I stopped chasing certs and started building hands-on cloud projects real experience companies actually wanted.

journey.title: The Breakthrough
journey.subtitle: I finally cracked the code and landed my first real cloud engineering role. My income jumped from 35K to $135K overnight.

journey.title: Job Stacking Begins
journey.subtitle: With the right system, I added contract after contract under my cloud engineer consulting company hitting $489K/year across multiple remote opportunities.

journey.title: Building the Program
journey.subtitle: Friends kept asking how I did it. I started mentoring others and they started winning too.

journey.title: Launching CloudBootcamp.AI
journey.subtitle: I launched a mentorship-based 8-week program designed to help others skip the guesswork and break into cloud

journey.title: 340+ Students Transformed
journey.subtitle: Our students have gone from stuck in Help Desk or non-tech jobs to making $130K–$200K+ remotely as Cloud Engineers.

students-interview.heading: Student Interviews
students-interview.paragraph: Step into the world of career transformation with inspiring interviews from students who went from zero cloud experience to landing high-paying roles in tech. From help desk jobs and non-tech backgrounds to remote Cloud Engineer positions earning $130K or more, their stories are proof of what’s possible with the right mentorship, hands-on training, and a proven system like CloudBootcamp.AI.

items.title: Isaac Rowaiye — $500k/Year | 3 Offers | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Isaac Rowaiye, who received 3 job offers and secured a $500,000/year income after completing his training with The 1% Percent University. Isaac is proof that when you level up your skills and position yourself the right way, you don’t chase opportunities, they chase you.

items.title: Greg East — $500k/Year | 5 Offers | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Greg East, who secured 5 different job offers and is now earning $500,000 a year. After completing his training with The 1% Percent University, Greg turned his skills into leverage, proving that when you commit and take action, life can change fast.

items.title: Brandon Njinjoh — $166k/Year | Cybersecurity to Cloud Engineer | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Brandon Njinjoh, who successfully transitioned from cybersecurity to a $166,000/year role as a Cloud Engineer. After putting in the work and completing his training with The 1% Percent University, Brandon turned job uncertainty into career elevation.

items.title: Darnell Hungerford — $150k/Year | Broke Into Cloud | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Darnell Hungerford, who broke into cloud engineering and landed a $150,000/year role after completing The 1% Percent University. Darnell's journey shows that with the right training and mindset, even a fresh start can lead to a six-figure career.

items.title: Davis I. — $100k/Year | Broke Into Tech | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Davis I., who broke into tech and secured his first $100,000/year role after going through The 1% Percent University. Davis didn’t come from a tech background, but with the right mentorship and focus, he turned ambition into a six-figure opportunity.

items.title: Dela Anthonio — $300k/Year | Multiple Contracts | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Dela Anthonio, who’s earning $300,000/year through multiple contracts after completing his training with The 1% Percent University. Dela built a career on his own terms, stacking opportunities and proving that one high-income skill can open many doors.

items.title: Meko Graves — $130k/Year | Registered Nurse to Cloud Engineer | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Meko Graves, who made the incredible leap from being a Registered Nurse to earning $130,000/year as a Cloud Engineer. After going through The 1% Percent University, Meko proved that it's never too late to pivot careers and step into tech, no matter your background.

items.title: Stormi Hein — $110k/Year | DevOps Engineer | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Stormi Hein, who landed a $110,000/year DevOps Engineer role after completing his training with The 1% Percent University. His journey is a powerful reminder that when you commit to learning the right skills, life-changing opportunities follow.

items.title: Jalen Verrett — $115k/Year | Personal Trainer to Cloud Engineer | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Jalen Verrett, who transitioned from being a personal trainer to earning $115,000/year as a Cloud Engineer. Through The 1% Percent University, Jalen took control of his future, showing that discipline in the gym can translate into high-paying results in tech.

items.title: Pelumi Adenikinju — $130k/Year | Software Engineer to Cloud Engineer | The 1% Percent University
items.description: Today we have Pelumi Adenikinju, who transitioned from a Software Engineer to a $130,000/year Cloud Engineer after completing his training with The 1% Percent University. His transformation shows that when you sharpen your skills and shift direction with purpose, you can unlock an entirely new level of income and freedom.

opportunity.question: What do you mean by a “$130K+ remote tech career without a degree?”
opportunity.answer: We help everyday people land cloud engineering roles by focusing on real-world skills, not paper certs or degrees. No fluff, just what actually gets you hired.

opportunity.question: Is this program only for people with tech experience?
opportunity.answer: Not at all. Many of our students started in retail, help desk, or other non-technical roles. If you’re willing to learn and take action, we’ll guide you through everything.

opportunity.question: Why Cloud Engineering?
opportunity.answer: It’s one of the most in-demand, high-paying, and remote-friendly paths in tech. The barrier to entry is lower than you think when you have the right roadmap.

opportunity.question: Why hands-on projects instead of certifications?
opportunity.answer: Certs are great, but recruiters care more about what you can do. Our projects prove your skills, build confidence, and make your resume stand out immediately.

opportunity.question: Isn’t tech super competitive?
opportunity.answer: Yes, if you do what everyone else is doing. Our program gives you an unfair advantage through personalized mentorship, recruiter-attraction systems, and a proven game plan.

about.question: What exactly is CloudBootcamp.AI?
about.answer: We’re a mentorship-driven platform helping people land cloud engineer roles in 8 weeks. No degree, no fluff, just a step-by-step path with coaching and support.

about.question: What makes your program different?
about.answer: We don’t just teach, we get you ready to work. You’ll graduate with a portfolio of real-world projects, job-ready experience, and a clear system to attract recruiters.

about.question: Do I get 1-on-1 support?
about.answer: Yes. You’ll be guided by expert mentors, attend weekly coaching calls, and get personalized help through our client success system and private community.

about.question: What do students do after the 8 weeks?
about.answer: They launch their careers. Most start interviewing in Week 6 to 8 and land their first $100K+ roles shortly after. Some even have multiple roles.

faqArray.question: How can a tech career give me more freedom in life?
faqArray.answer: A high-paying cloud engineering role puts you in control, working remotely, earning what you're truly worth, more time freedom, and designing a life on your terms. No degree needed. No years of climbing the corporate ladder.

faqArray.question: Is this really something anyone can do?
faqArray.answer: Yes, if you’re willing to put in the work. Many of our students started with zero tech background. Our mentorship and step-by-step roadmap bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be.

faqArray.question: Why Cloud Engineering specifically?
faqArray.answer: It’s one of the fastest growing, highest paying paths in tech. Demand is high, remote work is standard, and the skillset is transferable across industries.

faqArray.question: Why focus on hands-on learning?
faqArray.answer: Because it works. Real projects prove to employers you can do the job. That’s what leads to interviews and offers, not just certifications or theory.

faqArray.question: Isn’t the tech industry too crowded?
faqArray.answer: Only if you follow the crowd. Most people are stuck chasing certs with no direction. We give you a proven system, personal mentorship, and the tools to stand out fast.
